sentences.sContent: Some of the audience started booing.
She was booed off stage (=  they shouted ‘boo’ until she left the stage  ) .
sentences.sCn: 她被一片嘘声轰下了台。

trans.tranOther: to shout ‘boo’ to show that you do not like a person, performance, idea etc
a noise made by people who do not like a person, performance, idea etc
a noise made by people who do not like a person, performance, idea etc
